name: menu(for:string:options:atLocation:in:)
desc: Provides a menu containing contextual menu items suitable for certain kinds of detected results.
declaration:
func menu(for result: NSTextCheckingResult, 
   string checkedString: String, 
  options: [NSSpellChecker.OptionKey : Any]? = nil, 
atLocation location: NSPoint, 
       in view: NSView) -> NSMenu?
